short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lookup and save EWG™ product ratings from any webpage. Select text and right-click to lookup products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search for EWG™ ratings of products from any webpage. Select the name of the product and right-click to find possible matches on EWG™. Save products for later, then access them in the extension popup menu.
